page.title: 09HOME LIFE >> AN ADULTS DAY
page.content: Mr William JAMES Caretaker at Malpas Alport Primary school. 6.00 am get up,wash and eat breakfast 7,30 am arrive at school open up and check that everything is alright. 7,30 ..12.00 noon at work doing various jobs connected with the school. 12.00 noon ..3.00 break. 3.00.........6.00pm back at school to clean up after the days work that has been completed by the children and teaching staff. 6.00..7.00 evening meal 7.00..10.30 at the Malpas Sports Club 10,30..12.00 midnight watch T.V. During the lunch time brerak I often go to the sports club to mark out the pitches.. Iam the grounds man at the sports club..
